_sText:
This
is MY FIRST MAP!
Its a nice little jail break map I called ba_castle.
unfortunately there was another map named ba_jail_castle_v1 so I renamed it to ba_fortress_v1
There are 2 big Jails for the T's and there's a soccer field, a
swimming pool, a tower with an elevator, 4 hidden vents, approx. 5
hidden weapons and lots more!
The map can be played by a maximum of 29 T's and 14 CT's, but I can add
more spawnpoints if necessary!
If u find any bugs, leaks etc feel free to contact me so I can update
the map - I tried playing it with some friends and it worked pretty
good for us.
T's have a good chance to escape, but if CT's are intelligent they can
win easily too!
I'm looking forward to your comments - rememeber this is my first map
- if I did something essentially wrong, please tell me - I'm still
learning^^
so - have fun!

UPDATE**
1.8.09

I updated the map to Version 2!
I did some fixing and improved some performance things!

UPDATE**
2.8.09

update to Version 3
All Players spawn with no weapons but a knife

UPDATE**

update to Version 4
Fixed ERROR Models 
Replaced gm_forest tree model with a hl2 tree

Change log:
v2:
- deletet the second red cross @ pool house
- changed skin of soccerfield and the ball
- fixed some texture things @ the pool
- the two buttons @ T-spawn stairs now affect the light in Jails, and not just the light @ the stairs
- buttons for opening jails have now better textures
v3:
- all players spawn with no pistol
v4:
- fixed missing models
